Package io.aiven.kafka.connect.docs

Class BaseDocAppendable

java.lang.Object
io.aiven.kafka.connect.docs.BaseDocAppendable
All Implemented Interfaces:
DocAppendable, Appendable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MarkdownDocAppendable, TextDocAppendable
public abstract class BaseDocAppendable extends Object implements DocAppendable
An abstract implementation of DocAppendable that writes output to an Appendable instance.

This class is the superclass of all classes that filter help appendables. These appendable sit on top of an existing appendable (the underlying appendable) which it uses as its basic sink of data, but possibly transforming the data along the way or providing additional functionality.

The class BaseDocAppendable itself simply overrides all methods of DocAppendable with versions that pass all requests to the underlying appendable. Subclasses of BaseDocAppendable may further override some of these methods as well as provide additional methods and fields.

Implementation Note: This class is similar to FilterOutputStream in relation to OutputStream. We could further split BaseDocAppendable into a FilterAppendable but that seems like YAGNI.

Since:
1.10.0
